alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Bibb; Chilton; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Autauga, southwestern Chilton, Perry and southern Bibb Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 603 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Newbern to 6 miles west of Vida Junction. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Marion, Maplesville, Billingsley, Plecher, Lawley, Vaiden, Parnell, Mertz, Heiberger, Pooles Crossroads, Judson College, Radford, Stanton, Morgan Springs, Folsom, Oakmulgee, Sprott, Isabella and Vaiden Field Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
